{"step_by_step_thinking": "The document [8] mentions that the first-generation sealants were initiated by ultraviolet light, second-generation sealants are autopolymerized, and third-generation sealants use visible light. A recent innovation is the addition of fluoride to sealants. Therefore, fluoride pit and fissure sealants belong to the generation after the third one.", "answer_choice": "D"}
